News

Parent Council Meeting – MAY 2016

May 17, 2016 admin

The final Parent Council meeting of the year is on 25 May 2016 at 7pm in the staff room.

All parents are welcome to attend and find out more about what the Parent Council does.

Contact your Parent Council rep if you have any queries or questions that you’d like to discuss. The Parent Council email address is: enquiries@hyndlandprimaryparentcouncil.org. Details of reps are on our Contact Us page.
